languages.text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain the shrouded effect. This effect does not stack. Shrouded: as long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer deals damage with an attack of opportunity, they gain the shrouded effect. This effect does not stack. Shrouded: as long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically dodge. After that the shrouded effect is removed.

Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain the shrouded effect. This effect does not stack. Shrouded: as long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.

Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain the shrouded effect. This effect does not stack. Shrouded: as long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.

languages.text: 每当装备者通过{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，装备者都会获得“遮罩”效果。此效果不可叠加。 遮罩：当装备者拥有“遮罩”效果时，受到攻击时会自动{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，闪避后移除“遮罩”效果。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain the shrouded effect. This effect does not stack. Shrouded: as long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: 装备者获得+5{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}。当装备者离开威胁区域时，可以进行运动{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。此次检定会承受{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，等同于<u>攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}</u>。如果检定成功，攻击者会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果，且{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}会自动失手。

每当装备者通过{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，装备者都会获得“遮罩”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。此效果不可叠加。 遮罩：当装备者拥有“遮罩”效果时，受到攻击时会自动{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，闪避后移除“遮罩”效果。

languages.text: Нанося {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атакой по возможности{/g}, персонаж получает эффект "пелена" (не суммируется). Пелена: став целью атаки, персонаж автоматически {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от нее, после чего эффект снимается.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain the shrouded effect. This effect does not stack. Shrouded: as long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: Дает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетике{/g} +5. При выходе из области угрозы персонаж проводит проверку Атлетики со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} противника</u> . В случае успеха противник получает +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g} и промахивается {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атакой по возможности{/g}.

Дает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетике{/g} +5. При выходе из области угрозы персонаж проводит проверку Атлетики со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}ВОС{/g} противника</u> . В случае успеха противник получает +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g} и промахивается {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атакой по возможности{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えるたびに、とばり効果を獲得する。この効果はスタックしない。 とばり：使用者にとばり効果が発動している間は、攻撃のターゲットになると自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}する。攻撃回避後は、とばり効果が消える。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain the shrouded effect. This effect does not stack. Shrouded: as long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: この外套は使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を5与える。使用者が危険エリアから離れると、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}</u>{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}<u>を伴う身体能力{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を行う。成功すると、敵は{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}のスタックを1獲得し、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}は自動的に失敗する。

使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えるたびに、とばり{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を獲得する。この効果は蓄積しない。 とばり：使用者にとばり効果が発動している間は、攻撃のターゲットになると自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}する。攻撃回避後は、とばり効果が消える。

languages.text: Cuando el portador inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} con un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g}, gana el efecto de encubierto. Este efecto no es acumulativo. Encubierto: mientras el portador tenga el efecto encubierto, al ser objetivo de un ataque lo {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} automáticamente. Después se elimina el efecto.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain the shrouded effect. This effect does not stack. Shrouded: as long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: Esta capa otorga +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g} al portador. Si el portador sale de la zona de peligro, realiza una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de Atletismo con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de la <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} del enemigo</u>. Si lo consigue, el enemigo obtiene +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataque de oportunidad{/g} falla automáticamente.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} verursacht, erhält er den Verschleiert-Effekt. Dieser Effekt ist nicht stapelbar. Verschleiert: Solange der Träger den Verschleiert-Effekt hat, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}weicht er automatisch aus{/g}, wenn er das Ziel eines Angriffs wird. Danach wird der Verschleiert-Effekt entfernt.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain the shrouded effect. This effect does not stack. Shrouded: as long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Umhang gewährt dem Träger +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}. Wenn der Träger einen bedrohten Bereich verlässt, durchläuft er eine Athletik-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} des Feindes</u>. Bei Erfolg erhält der Feind +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g} und der {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} verfehlt automatisch.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}, il bénéficie de l'effet Voile. Cet effet n'est pas cumulable. Voile : tant que l'utilisateur bénéficie de l'effet Voile, il {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} automatiquement la première attaque qui le cible. Ensuite, l'effet disparaît.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain the shrouded effect. This effect does not stack. Shrouded: as long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.

traits.locale_text: Cette cape confère à son utilisateur un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de compétence {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétique{/g} de +5. Lorsque l'utilisateur quitte une zone menacée, il passe un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de compétence Athlétique avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de l'ennemi</u>. Si l'utilisateur réussit ce test, l'ennemi reçoit +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g} se solde automatiquement par un échec.

Cette cape confère à son utilisateur un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de compétence {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétique{/g} de +5. Lorsque l'utilisateur quitte une zone menacée, il passe un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de compétence Athlétique avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de l'ennemi</u>. Si l'utilisateur réussit ce test, l'ennemi reçoit +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g} se solde automatiquement par un échec.

languages.text: Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırısı{/g} ile {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verdiğinde örtülü etkisini kazanır. Bu etki, üst üste birikmez. Örtülü: Takan kişi, örtülü etkisinde olduğu sürece bir saldırının hedefi olursa o saldırıdan otomatik olarak {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınır{/g}. Kaçınmanın ardından örtülü etkisi ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain the shrouded effect. This effect does not stack. Shrouded: as long as the wearer has the shrouded effect, when becoming the target of an attack, they automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}. After that the shrouded effect is removed.
